title: EastEnders star Zack Morris called n-word in vile racist attack
text:
EastEnders’ Zack Morris reveals he was racially abused (Picture: Getty)

EastEnders’ Zack Morris has hit out after being racially abused while walking to his car.

Taking to Twitter the actor, who plays Keegan Baker on the BBC soap, explained he was in a car park when a man approached him, shouting out racial slurs including the n-word.

‘To those who think racism is a thing of the past,’ he told his 30.3k followers. ‘Last night I walking through a car park to my car and was getting abuse from this random guy calling me a “N****” and “Uncle Tom” repeatedly.

‘This is the sort of mentality that is still destroying our generation and it MUST STOP.’

Right on cue, fans rushed to comfort the actor over his ordeal.

‘Genuinely find stuff like this disgusting and frustrating; especially cos we’re in 2019,’ one replied. ‘Hope you’re okay bro.’

Zack’s fans rushed to comfort him over the attack (Picture: Getty)

‘Oh man… hanging head and sending love,’ another commented.

‘That’s nasty, it’s simply jealousy and childish, you are who you are man BIGGG love to ya bro,’ a follower said.

While a Twitter user added: ‘It really is shocking behaviour hope you’re ok Zack x.’

Zack is currently starring as Keegan Baker in EastEnders, with his character set for a dramatic few weeks.

Keegan and Tiffany have been getting close on EastEnders (Picture: BBC)

After popping the question to Tiffany Butcher (Maisie Smith), their respective families were less than impressed by the idea of a wedding, leading the pair to take matters into their own hands.

In fact, the lovebirds decide to elope and get married in secret.

Pictures show Karen Taylor, Chantelle Atkins, Bernadette Taylor, Jack Branning, Sonia Fowler, Whitney Dean filming on location, as Teegan rush to the registry office.

But will the happy couple get a happier ending?

description: EastEnders’ Zack Morris has hit out after being racially abused while walking to his car.
